base_description: Rectangular, gray cabinet with two sections.
part_description: Upper section has three vertical panels; lower section is a single large panel. Both sections are rectangular and aligned vertically.
internal_interaction_description: The upper section's three panels are positioned side by side, dividing the space into three compartments. The lower section is a single, larger compartment, possibly for storing larger items. Both sections likely have hinges or sliding mechanisms for opening.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be mounted on a wall or placed on a surface. It interacts with users by allowing storage and organization of items within its compartments. The panels may open outward or slide to provide access.
